description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Get a sneak-peek at the all-new 2007 Toyota Yaris! Race your Yaris up walls, through tubes, and even upside-down as you destroy enemies! Take on the challenge by yourself, or speed around the tracks with your friends on Xbox LIVE. With three different models to drive, eight tracks, and a host of enemies (plus a full arsenal with which to destroy them), you'll be moving forward with Yaris!
description.short: Race your Toyota Yaris up walls, through tubes and even upside-down as you destroy enemies!  You'll be moving forward with Yaris!
